name: Super Play Action Football
overview: Full Power Action In Three Football Leagues! Dive, spin and stiff-arm your way to football glory! All 28 NFL teams, 97 college clubs and a competitive field of high school squads are represented. You can choose from up to 32 offensive and 16 defensive plays, then change your offense on the fly with an audible. The realistic graphics feature a close-up on the action and a radar view of the entire field. If you're hot in the college ranks, you'll shoot up to the Top 20 and earn a prestigious bowl bid. Do well in the pros and you'll head for the Super Bowl. Post-game stats announce how each team and each NFL player ranks as the season progresses. One of two players can challenge the computer or two players can face-off in exciting head-to-head competition.
